_header: Mildest of mood and meekest of maidens all
Subjects: acrostics; Virgin Mary, joys of; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: Hymn on the Five Joys — five 8-line stanzas (‘MARIA’) to which are added six lines forming the acrostic ‘Pipwel’

BodRo22.First Lines:
Myldyste of moode & mekyst of maydyns alleO modyrs mercyfullyst
                    most chast þat euer was wyfe…
BodRo22.Last Lines:
…Euyr lastyng to lyue yn þat mancioneLady graunt vs thys
                    sayde supplycacione
BodRo22.Editions:
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             “Die Katherinenhymne des Ricardus Spaldyng.” 
             Angli
         30 (1907): 523-48: 257-8.
Holthausen,  Ferdinand. 
             “Ein mittelenglisches gedicht über die Fünf freuden
                Marias.” 
             Anglia
         59 (1935): 319-21: 319-21.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 55-6.
